Package meka.experiment.evaluators

Class RepeatedRuns

  • java.lang.Object
    • meka.events.LogObject
      • meka.experiment.evaluators.AbstractEvaluator
        • meka.experiment.evaluators.AbstractMetaEvaluator
          • meka.experiment.evaluators.RepeatedRuns
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ThreadLimiter, LogSupporter, Evaluator, weka.core.OptionHandler

    public class RepeatedRuns
extends AbstractMetaEvaluator
implements ThreadLimiter
    Repeatedly executes the base evaluator.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    FracPete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
